messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average build of a dhole?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus of a dhole?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the immediate effect of being hit by a dhole's bulk?
Death is automatic.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the range of the dhole's goo spit?
A range of 2-3 miles
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does a victim climb out of a dhole's goo?
Requires an Extreme STR roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a victim held in the dhole's goo?
Costs the investigator 1 hit point per round
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the investigator if they are held by the caustic slime?
The investigator begins to drown and loses 1 hit point per round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of a dhole swallowing someone?
The dhole scoops clean an area equal in size to the area of its goo attack.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage dealt by the Spit Goo attack?
50% damage, special type.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage dealt by the Engulf attack?
80% damage, swallowed type.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the burning damage after the victim escapes?
The burning damage stops.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What damage percentage is associated with Engulf?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What inspired Ay-i-Shak to write about the bholes?
He claimed to have visited and consorted with the bholes in the land of dream.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Ay-i-Shak's close call with the bholes?
He barely escaped with his life, and had to make a timely sacrifice of his young assistant, Mamoud, to make his escape.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What creature was described as shuffling towards Ay-i-Shak in the darkness?
A gigantic, blasphemous form of a thing not wholly ape and not wholly insect, referred to as a dhole.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did the bholes send their dhole progeny across space and time?
Through unfathomable means, sending their dhole progeny across space and time to planets in the Waking World.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a characteristic of the creature's forepaws?
Its forepaws were extended, with talons spread wide.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the creature's capacity?
It is assumed that they are entities capable of walking between the planes and worlds of the universe.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the creature's state of being?
Its whole body was taut with murderous malignity.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is known about the creature's head?
A rugose, dead-eyed rudiment of a head swayed drunkenly from side to side.
